Articles.Content:
Correct, and also the original transport tycoon (rocks out to that music).

The user below me has never experienced a hell kraken.

Is that the one where you EVA and all hell breaks loose? No, I've never had that happen... But the gyro Kraken spun my entire Mun base to bits.

The user below has had a Kraken encounter of some form.

True. A Munar mining network (Kethane) bugged out and spontaneously imploded everywhere (that's the worst one I've had).

The user below me has been playing since 0.14 or earlier.

False.

The user below me wishes they had found out abut kerbal space program pre-0.14.

Truest thing ever.

The user below has known about KSP before it was even released.

False, I think it was kept hush-hush until first release.

The user below me prefers Minmus to Mun.

Yes.

The user below has landed on every planet and moon.

False

The user below me has an ugly avatar picture

False, it's delicious.

The user below me has achieved flight on an atmosphere-bearing planet other than Kerbin.

Define "flight". If it means "crashing whilst generating lift and thrust", then True.

The user below uses invisible text.

True.

The user below me will not entertain us with a good joke.

False. I'll post a GLaDOS quote.

All Aperture Science technologies remain fully operational up to 4000 degrees Kelvin. So there is no chance of a dangerous equipment malfunction prior to your victory candescence.

The user below can state what GLaDOS stands for.

True: GLaDOS - Genetic Lifeform and Disk Operating System.

The user below is yet to visit to the Jool system.

That is false. I have successfully sent a SCIENCE!!! probe to Jool and Laythe.

stringOne = 'The user below understands Python'

answer = input()

if answer.startswith('T'):

iiii print('You are a boss')

else:

iiii print('learn it')

True - I have made a small program in Python. It was a Neptune's Pride battle calculator.

And I learned Python just for that and nothing else. Later I tried using it for some Bf2 modding, but had no success. By now I have probably forgotten most of what I knew, though.

The user below doesn't like Valentine's day.

Edited February 14, 2014 by xrayfishx

False. While I don't get involved, I think it's a good idea - it prevents things from becoming mundane.

The user below me is apprehensive about using the ribbon generator.

false until now I didn't know about it..

The user below me has made a Kraken drive

False; I don't Even know what that is

The user below me has over 1000 posts on this forum

False, until now I didn't know about it (link to ribbons)

The user below me has made an addon for the game (.craft files count as addons)

EVERY TIME! Yep, I've made addons. (Tweakable Wheels is my best so far)

The user below me... likes bread.

True, especially sourdough.

The person below me thinks this is really cute.

Negative

User below me knows about the Soviet Buran spacecraft.

Yes, very much.

The user below me was alive during the moon landing.

False, but it would have been pretty awesome. I guess the Mars and Asteroid landings will have to suffice

The user below me is yet to discover Mars One.

False, I am aware of Mars One and have been for a while.

The user below me want to be a real-life astronaut.
